aboutMe: Hard-working junior ​web developer, eager to learn and evolve as a software and web developer in particular , currently enrolled to the open university, and a front end bootcamp graduate. An amature photographer at my spare time and a big time sports fan.Computer programmer with a track record for working efficiently in a fast-paced environment while multitasking on numerous projects, both independently and on a team. Proven leader and project manager with a can-do attitude. Skills include C, C++, C#, and Java.A self-learner of new technologies, In addition, Worked with teams using AGILE methods and experienced with editing software like PHOTOSHOP, video editing and more.True passion and love for creating pixel perfect client-side websites. I have over 15 years of experience in HTML and CSS include management teams. I’m highly motivated, with strong learning skills and a team player.  Specialties: HTML5, CSS3, UI/UXAn Autodidact with blend technology knowledge with the desire and the passion to excel in the field of technology.Hi Tech professional with extensive knowledge in Software development. I have been professionally creating and developing software for over 6 years, specializing in .Net, Web and enterprise applications. Team player with an excellent communication skills and self-learning capabilities, Highly determined and dedicated with a real passion for development technologies. Always looking for new opportunities.
